user_instruction: 'Tell John to reply to me (sarah@advantagemedia.com) with customer insights that can help with our marketing campaign, and remind him to check his Gmail for the necessary information.'

formatted_items.content:
Subject: Request for Customer Insights for Upcoming Campaign  

Hi John,

I hope you’re doing well. Could you please share any customer insights or data that might help us shape AdVantage Media’s upcoming marketing campaign? When convenient, kindly reply directly to me at sarah@advantagemedia.com so we can incorporate the information into our strategy.

Also, please take a moment to check your Gmail inbox—there’s some additional context there that should be useful.

Thank you in advance for your support. Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best regards,  
Sarah Thompson  
Campaign Strategist  
AdVantage Media

final_output:
Subject: Request for Customer Insights for Upcoming Campaign

Also, please take a moment to check your Gmail inbox—there’s some additional context there that should be useful.

Thank you in advance for your support. Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best regards,  
Sarah Thompson  
Campaign Strategist  
AdVantage Media
